/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the urban landscape. The street, lined with trees and buildings, is filled with cars and pedestrians, adding a dynamic element to the scene. The sky above is overcast, casting a soft light over the cityscape. The colors in the image are predominantly gray and green, reflecting the urban environment and the natural elements within it.
